location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 50: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Samuel Manesty begins this letter by stating that he is forwarding a duplicate of his letter of 29 May 1785 (see the previous item in this volume). He informs Edward Galley that the Begler, commanded by Captain Peter Scott, is departing for Fort St George with dispatches both for that place and for Fort William. He asks Galley to inform him of the times of the vessel's arrival at, and departure from, Bushire.Reports on movement of the ship Beglerunder Captain Peter Scott to Fort Saint George and Fort William. Also requests a report on the arrival and departure of the Beglerat Bushire.
